title: Aria the Animation
resume: Fifteen year-old Akari Mizunashi is a dreamer.  She’s left everything behind to become a female gondolier on the  faraway sparkling planet covered in water called Aqua. She’s one step  closer to fulfilling her dream when she begins training with the  prestigious Aria Company, but is she prepared for the challenges that  await her?
